Introduction ​

Fully styled and customizable components for Vue 3.

This module has been developed by the minasyan.info team, its goal is to provide everything related to UI when building a Vue app. This includes components, icons, colors, dark mode but also keyboard shortcuts.

Features ​

  • Built with Headless UI and Tailwind CSS
  • Dark mode support
  • Support for LTR and RTL languages
  • Keyboard shortcuts
  • Icons
  • Fully typed

Credits ​

  • nuxtlabs/ui
  • tailwindlabs/tailwindcss
  • tailwindlabs/headlessui
  • vueuse/vueuse
  • @iconify/tailwind
